entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who is having trouble with Occlumency lessons. He is frustrated and defensive about his inability to close his mind.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a friend of Harry's who is trying to help him understand the situation. She is sharp and quick-witted.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who has asked Snape to teach Harry Occlumency. He wants Harry to avoid having dreams about a certain corridor.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is the teacher assigned to teach Harry Occlumency. He is trying to get inside Harry's head, but Ron suggests that he may actually be trying to help Harry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's who has a dark and meaningful idea about Snape's intentions. He is slow to speak but has a clever insight.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is likely Voldemort, the main antagonist of the series. Ron suggests that Snape may be trying to make it easier for him to get inside Harry's mind.

relationships.description: Snape is trying to get inside Harry's head, but Ron suggests that he may actually be trying to help Harry.
Dumbledore has asked Snape to teach Harry Occlumency.
